function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of SARS-CoV-2 in the workplace due to close contact and contact with contaminated surfaces","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 infection among workers, leading to illness and productivity loss","Mitigation":"Implementing social distancing measures, regular disinfection of surfaces, and providing personal protective equipment","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, contactless access systems, and UV sterilization equipment","People":"Workers in offshore facilities, public service workers, health workers","Owner":"Employers, facility managers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"High person on board (POB) density in offshore platforms leading to increased risk of COVID-19 outbreak","Impact":"Potential large-scale COVID-19 outbreak, loss of working hours, and impact on production","Mitigation":"Reducing POB density, implementing regular testing and health screenings, and enhancing ventilation systems","Technologies":"Occupancy monitoring systems, health monitoring apps, and ventilation control systems","People":"Workers on offshore platforms, oil and gas industry workers","Owner":"Facility managers, oil and gas companies, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Impact of COVID-19 on productivity and industries due to worker illness and absenteeism","Impact":"Decreased productivity, economic loss, and disruption of various industries","Mitigation":"Remote work arrangements, flexible scheduling, and vaccination programs","Technologies":"Telecommuting tools, scheduling software, and vaccination management systems","People":"Workers, employers, industry stakeholders","Owner":"Employers, government agencies, industry associations"}]}
